attributes.action: Limit the amount of immairants entering the UK each year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With No limit on the level of immigrants allowed to enter the UK each year, As a White British Woman, I am finding it increasingly difficult to find "BRITISH" people.

The UK basically has "open doors to all in the EU" This needs to stop!! Our children are failing in school due to overcrowding. Our waiting lists at Dr's & Denist is never ending. Our NHS is another story all together.

Something needs to be done!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
